entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, a young boy who is about to start attending Hogwarts.

entities.name: albus dumbledore
entities.description: The Headmaster of Hogwarts, mentioned as one of the greatest Headmasters ever had.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A gamekeeper at Hogwarts who is known for being a bit eccentric and having magical abilities.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Harry's uncle, who is opposed to Harry learning magic.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Harry's aunt, who is also opposed to Harry learning magic.

relationships.description: Hagrid works under Albus Dumbledore as the Headmaster of Hogwarts.
Hagrid has a conflict with Uncle Vernon, who is opposed to Harry learning magic.
